---

**Introducing the Ultimate Squirrel House/Nesting Box â€“ Your New Wildlife Haven!**

Step into the world of natural wildlife conservation with our stunning Squirrel House/Nesting Box, crafted from premium cedar wood and designed for outdoor use. This beautifully handcrafted piece not only provides a safe and cozy habitat for your local squirrels but also adds a charming touch to any garden or backyard.

**Crafted for Nature Enthusiasts:**
- **Material:** Durable and weather-resistant cedar wood ensures your squirrel house stays strong and secure for years to come.
- **Placement:** Perfect for outdoor use, this nesting box is designed to withstand various weather conditions, ensuring a safe haven for squirrels year-round.

**Elegant and Functional Design:**
- **Glued and Nailed Construction:** Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box is expertly constructed with both glue and nails, ensuring a sturdy and long-lasting structure.
- **Burned Image of Squirrel:** A unique burned image of a squirrel by artist Drew Senesac adds a touch of rustic charm and artistic flair to your outdoor space.

**User-Friendly Design:**
- **Removable Roof for Easy Cleaning:** With a removable roof, you can easily clean the inside of the nesting box and ensure it remains a clean and healthy environment for your squirrels.
- **Mounting Hardware Included:** Two pre-drilled holes and two screws and washers are provided for easy mounting, making setup a breeze.

** Dimensions & Features:**
- **Outside Dimensions:** 12 inches (width) x 11 inches (height) x 10 inches (depth)
- **Inside Dimensions:** 5.75 inches (width) x 9 inches (depth)
- **Squirrel Opening Diameter:** 3.5 inches

**Complete with Everything You Need:**
- **2 Screws and 2 Washers Included:** All the necessary hardware for mounting is provided, ensuring a hassle-free installation process.

Transform your outdoor space into a wildlife sanctuary with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order now and provide a safe and comfortable home for your furry forest friends!
